instructions: Clean up all dangling processes after completion of tasks
Present all information as concisely as possible even at the cost of grammar
Run `make mocks` after modifying repository interface files
Run `make generate` after modifying .sql query files in internal/database/queries/
Run `make lint` after editing Go files (encouraged, not enforced)
Run tests before commits: `make test` or specific test package
Follow existing error handling patterns - wrap with fmt.Errorf
Read docs/journal.md files for design context before major changes
Write to the appropriate journal.md file in docs following major changes
Check docs/CLIENT_WRAPPER_CHECKLIST.md for API endpoint coverage
When adding API endpoints, ask user to confirm full pattern (domain, service, repo, handler, Discord client, C# client)
When adding Discord commands, ask user to confirm options, autocomplete, and API endpoint mapping
Watch for hard-coded strings - extract to constants in internal/domain/
After API changes, verify synchronization across: internal/handler/, internal/discord/client.go, client/csharp/BrandishBotClient.cs
Look for code duplication opportunities during refactoring
Use transaction pattern with FOR UPDATE for inventory/economy operations
